name: prowlarr
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing a Prowlarr application.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`prowlarr` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/devopsarr/terraform-provider-prowlarr).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing a Prowlarr application.
nodejs.readme:

> first check the [`pulumi-prowlarr` repo](https://github.com/MaienM/pulumi-prowlarr/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,

apiKey.description: API key for Prowlarr authentication. Can be specified via the `PROWLARR_API_KEY` environment variable.

url.description:
Full Prowlarr URL with protocol and port (e.g. `https://test.prowlarr.com:9696`). You should **NOT** supply any path
(`/api`), the SDK will use the appropriate paths. Can be specified via the `PROWLARR_URL` environment variable.

additionalTags.description: Additional tags, `0` TitleSlug, `1` Quality, `2` Language, `3` ReleaseGroup, `4` Year, `5` Indexer, `6` Network.

intialState.description: Initial state, with Stop support. `0` Start, `1` ForceStart, `2` Pause, `3` Stop.

boolValue.description: Bool value. Only one value must be filled out.

numberValue.description: Number value. Only one value must be filled out.

sensitiveValue.description: Sensitive string value. Only one value must be filled out.

setValues.description: Set value. Only one value must be filled out.

textValue.description: Text value. Only one value must be filled out.

grabFields.description: Grab fields. `0` Overview, `1` Rating, `2` Genres, `3` Quality, `4` Group, `5` Size, `6` Links, `7` Release, `8` Poster, `9` Fanart, `10` CustomFormats, `11` CustomFormatScore.

notificationType.description: Notification type. `0` Info, `1` Success, `2` Warning, `3` Failure.

provider.description:
The provider type for the prowlarr package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

apiKey.description: API key for Prowlarr authentication. Can be specified via the `PROWLARR_API_KEY` environment variable.

url.description:
Full Prowlarr URL with protocol and port (e.g. `https://test.prowlarr.com:9696`). You should **NOT** supply any path
(`/api`), the SDK will use the appropriate paths. Can be specified via the `PROWLARR_URL` environment variable.

prowlarr:Application/application:Applica.description:
<!-- subcategory:Applications -->Generic Application resource. When possible use a specific resource instead.
For more information refer to [Application](https://wiki.servarr.com/prowlarr/settings#applications).

{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage
{{% example %}}

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as prowlarr from "@maienm/pulumi-prowlarr";

const example = new prowlarr.application.Application("example", {
    apiKey: "APIKey",
    baseUrl: "http://localhost:8686",
    configContract: "LidarrSettings",
    implementation: "Lidarr",
    name: "Example",
    prowlarrUrl: "http://localhost:9696",
    syncCategories: [
        3000,
        3010,
        3030,
    ],
    syncLevel: "disabled",
});
```
```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_prowlarr as prowlarr

example = prowlarr.application.Application("example",
    api_key="APIKey",
    base_url="http://localhost:8686",
    config_contract="LidarrSettings",
    implementation="Lidarr",
    name="Example",
    prowlarr_url="http://localhost:9696",
    sync_categories=[
        3000,
        3010,
        3030,
    ],
    sync_level="disabled")
```
```csharp
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using Pulumi;
using Prowlarr = MaienM.Prowlarr;

return await Deployment.RunAsync(() => 
{
    var example = new Prowlarr.Application.Application("example", new()
    {
        ApiKey = "APIKey",
        BaseUrl = "http://localhost:8686",
        ConfigContract = "LidarrSettings",
        Implementation = "Lidarr",
        Name = "Example",
        ProwlarrUrl = "http://localhost:9696",
        SyncCategories = new[]
        {
            3000,
            3010,
            3030,
        },
        SyncLevel = "disabled",
    });

});
```
```go
package main

import (
	"github.com/MaienM/pulumi-prowlarr/sdk/v2/go/prowlarr/Application"

	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {

			ApiKey:         pulumi.String("APIKey"),
			BaseUrl:        pulumi.String("http://localhost:8686"),
			ConfigContract: pulumi.String("LidarrSettings"),
			Implementation: pulumi.String("Lidarr"),
			Name:           pulumi.String("Example"),
			ProwlarrUrl:    pulumi.String("http://localhost:9696"),
			SyncCategories: pulumi.IntArray{
				pulumi.Int(3000),
				pulumi.Int(3010),
				pulumi.Int(3030),
			},
			SyncLevel: pulumi.String("disabled"),
		})
		if err != nil {
			return err
		}
		return nil
	})
}
```
